-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 23, 1999 3:46 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric's and PvP


>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
>I have heard (haven't tried, not high enough level) that a nasty tactic
that
>clerics can employ is to use Cancel Magic to remove buffs from other
>players.
>
>Warning though, I believe this can result in bad things happening in terms
>of having your account suspended. It may fall under the same category as
>training MOBs onto players on purpose.


Verant -- either Brad or John Smedley, can't remember which -- has stated
that Cancel Magic'ing as a defense against KS'ers is NOT a bannable offense,
and is a legitimate tactic. What you can't do is to follow the KS around,
even after he has left your area and is no longer KS'ing you. That's
considered harassment, as it should be.

== Gilead, dwarven cleric of Brell, Fennin Ro
